articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" 
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed light comedy "Echo of Mountain", Kim Il Sung Prize Laureate, now being put on local stages, at the Hamhung Grand Theatre together with servicepersons of the KPA.
					 The light comedy is such masterpiece of the era that the more one watches it, the more profound truth of life one grasps, he said, adding that it has such outstanding influence and attraction as gripping the hearts of audience and giving full play to their mental power. This comedy, therefore, serves as a close companion and a textbook for our army and people in their life, he stressed.
					
					 Recalling that the creators and artistes of the State Theatrical Troupe have remained true to the WPK's literary and art policy by creating and performing excellent works required by the times in every annal of the revolution, he said that they have greatly encouraged the army and people of the country in their drive to greet the 65th anniversary of the WPK and its conference with high political enthusiasm and shining labor achievements by staging the light comedy, monumental masterpiece of the Juche-oriented theatrical art in the new century. He highly estimated their revolutionary performing activities and extended thanks to them in the name of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Revolutionary literary and art works serve as an effective means of education as it powerfully encourages the party members and other working people to perform feats in their struggle for their great influence and cognitive and instructive significance, he said, stressing the need for the creators and artistes of the country to create many more masterpieces such as the light comedy greatly conducive to giving full play to the mental power of the masses and thus imbue great strength and courage into the servicepersons and people all out in the drive to build a thriving nation. 
					
					  Appreciating the performance together with him were Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kyong Hui, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, directors of the NDC of the DPRK, Kwak Pom Gi, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, and other leading officials in the province.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spreads to Centenarians
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spreads to Centenarians 
						
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Birthday spreads were sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il to female centenarians Hong Jong Ju and Jo Jong Suk residing in Sukchon County, South Phyongan Province and Munchon City, Kangwon Province carrying his profound loving care.
					 Subject to all sorts of maltreatment and insult as members of the stateless nation after their births in the period of the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, they could not enjoy a worthy life and happiness till President Kim Il Sung liberated the country.
					
					 They worked hard with their single desire to repay the great benevolence shown by the Workers' Party of Korea and the President for them. They kept themselves busy even after they became pensioners. 
					
					 They like boiled rice mixed with four other staple cereals and food made out of bean, in particular. They are always optimistic in their life, doing kitchen work and tending family gardens.

articles.title: CPRK Denounces Lee Myung Bak's Anti-Reunification Vituperation
articles.content:
CPRK Denounces Lee Myung Bak's Anti-Reunification Vituperation
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Tuesday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA lashing out at traitor Lee Myung Bak for letting loose a spate of vituperation for anti-reunification and confrontation, pulling up the DPRK in his "address made on August 15":
					 It is needless to say that the "unification tax" spelled out by the traitor is very unsavory trumpeting as it meant "contingency in the north", a foolish pipedream.
					
					Lee's vituperations are nothing but anti-reunification and confrontation outbursts as they laid bare his real intention to evade the blame for the collapse of the inter-Korean relations and persistently pursue "no-nuke, opening and 3000 dollars", a vicious confrontation policy, and treacherous invectives bringing the present acute situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 The puppet group let loose a spate of very shameless sophism such as "peaceful unification" and "community" while frantically staging the large-scale DPRK-targeted war exercises such as Ulji Freedom Guardian across south Korea in league with the U.S. This is nothing but a petty trick to conceal its true colors as bellicose elements and mislead public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 Moreover, he vociferated about "change in the north", linking the already bankrupt conspiratorial warship case to the DPRK. This is an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK as it brought into bolder relief the vicious intention of the group of traitors to rush headlong into confrontation and war to the last.
					
					 The traitor talked about "unification tax," sheer nonsense, at a time when the situation prevailing in Korea is so tense that a war may break out any moment. This is no more than sophism let loose by an idiot who knows nothing about reunification, insensitive to what is happening in the world and ignorant of the inter-Korean relations, a profiteer who knows nothing but money and a political imbecile. That is why he has become a target of derision by the public at home and abroad. 
					
					 It is quite preposterous for the group to cry out for "peaceful community" while staging the DPRK-targeted war exercises almost everyday, to trumpet about "economic community" after totally scuttling the inter-Korean cooperation and to call for "national community" after totally negating the north-south joint declarations and standing in the way of the country's reunification.
					
					 The puppet group unreasonably put up someone's "dismantlement of nukes" as preconditions for mending the inter-Korean relations and achieving reunification. This is nothing but ridiculous rhetoric to force the DPRK to disarm itself and realize the ambition for invading the DPRK together with the U.S. and is as foolish an act as expecting the sky to fall.
					
					 The vituperations let loose by the traitor are tantamount to a declaration of an all-out confrontation to bring down the system in the DPRK.
					
					 The recent rhetoric made by the traitor clearly proves that he is an arch criminal who pushed the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 The traitor will be forced to pay a dear price for spelling out the "unification tax", his own invention.
					
					 He had better mind his own business now on the verge of bankruptcy before foolishly seeking to bring down other's system.       If the group of traitors rushes headlong into confrontation to the last, the DPRK will resolutely react to it.

articles.title: Ro Tu Chol Meets Laos Vice PM
articles.content:
Ro Tu Chol Meets Laos Vice PM
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the DPRK, and Somsavath Lengsavath, standing vice-prime minister of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and officials concerned and from the Lao side were the party of the standing vice-prime minister and Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK. 
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the matter of boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and other issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Indonesia's Independence Day Marked
articles.content:
Indonesia's Independence Day Marked
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Fitri Riyanti, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Indonesian embassy here, arranged a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club Tuesday to mark the 65th anniversary of the independence of his country. 
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Association, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here. 
					
					 Staff members of the Indonesian embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang meeting took place at the Central Hall of Workers Tuesday to mark the 20th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the Entire Nation Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country."
					 The work published on August 18, Juche 79 (1990) comprehensively clarifies tasks and ways for waging the movement for reunification such as the issue of achieving the reunification of the country by federal formula on the three principles --independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity-- and the issue of calling on all Koreans to form a widespread united front and struggle in close unity. 
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, said in his report that a dynamic struggle was waged at home and abroad to organize the reunification movement into a movement of the whole nation on the basis of the achievements made by the pan-national rally in hearty response to the work clearly indicating the ways to solve the issue of reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans and this led to the birth of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification. 
					
					 The President's idea of great unity of the whole nation and the valuable experience of the national unity have become the nation's treasure and a solid foundation for achieving the great unity of the whole nation and independent reunification, he said, stressing that the exploits performed by the President will always shine in the history of the country.
					
					 The reporter went on to say:
					
					The President's cause of national reunification is being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He published works such as "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" and "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" to indicate the true way of bringing about a landmark turn in the inter-Korean relations and national reunification.
					
					 He provided the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, its action programme, thus enabling the Korean nation to greet a new era of achieving the national unity and independent reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 The reporter called on all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to unite close under the banner of national reunification, the patriotic banner, and thus turn out as one in the struggle for decisively foiling the reckless moves of the anti-reunification forces and bringing earlier national reunification.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Hamhung
articles.content:
Senior State Officials Visit Hamhung
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Senior state officials and officials of party, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited different parts of Humhung City, South Hamgyong Province on Tuesday.
					 They laid bouquets in front of the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing in the city and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 They visited the Songun Iron Foundry and the Songun Compressor Shop which were newly built at the Ryongsong Machine Complex. After being briefed on the immoral leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il, they went round production processes.
					
					 Watching varieties of quality castings and modern compressors being produced, they learned about the indomitable spirit of the workers of the complex. 
					
					 They also visited the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex. 
					
					 They were deeply impressed to witness the dynamism in the gasification project construction site in Hungnam and the revolutionary spirit of the workers in the giant chemical base where vinalon is mass-produced. 
					
					 While looking round the South Hamgyong Provincial Consumer Goods Exhibition, they expressed admiration at the traits of working people in the province producing useful consumer goods by tapping and using locally available materials, agricultural products and inner reserves.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Gabon President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Gabon President
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Ali Bongo Ondimba, President of Gabon, on the occasion of its 50th independence day.
					Expressing conviction that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop, Kim in the message sincerely wished the President greater success in his work for national unity and socio-economic development.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Indonesian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Indonesian President
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, President of Indonesia, on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of its independence.
					Wishing the President of Indonesia greater success in his work for national unity, prosperity of the country and the people's well-being, Kim in the message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Indonesian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Indonesian FM
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa, foreign minister of Indonesia, on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that cooperation between the two ministries would become closer to further develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries in different fields.

articles.title: Taedong River-crossing Contest Held
articles.content:
Taedong River-crossing Contest Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A Taedong River-crossing contest of school youth and children in Pyongyang took place Tuesday to mark the Youth Day.
					 The contest brought together at least 1,200 boys and girls selected from schools of districts and county of Pyongyang.
					
					 A kick-off meeting held on the bank of Taedong River in front of Kim Il Sung Square was followed by the contest.
					
					 Students from Mangyongdae District and Rakrang District placed first at the contest.
					
					 Earlier, a demonstration of the Taedong River-crossing was made by pupils of Pyongyang Namsin Primary School.

articles.title: Songdowon Camp Greets 50th Birthday
articles.content:
Songdowon Camp Greets 50th Birthday
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Songdowon International Children's Camp situated in Wonsan City greets its 50th anniversary.
					Since the seaside camp was opened on August 17, Juche 49 (1960), it has accommodated more than 320,000 schoolchildren. Of them much more than ten thousands are those from some ten countries, including China, Cuba, Russia, Syria, Thailand, Tanzania, Nigeria and Mexico.
					
					 In the camp with clean seawater, glittering sand beach and thick pine forest going well with each other, boys and girls enjoy sea bathing, boating, diving and the like.
					
					 They also deepen friendship through meetings, sports games and amusements.
					
					The camp has two buildings with over 220 bedrooms and the International Friendship House of Children with a 1,200-seat theater. It is furnished with a music room, indoor swimming pool, wading pool, amusement facilities, playground, boating ground, ballroom, dining hall, clinic and store.

articles.title: Tower with Meaningful Numbers
articles.content:
Tower with Meaningful Numbers
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower is standing at the entrance of Tongil Street in Pyongyang. 
					The tower reflects the desire of the Korean nation to put an end to the national division, which has been kept up for more than half a century, and to reunify the country. It consists of two women in Korean national clothes holding the three charters emblem with a Korean map carved on it.
					
					Its height is 30 meters symbolizing three charters -- three principles of national reunification, ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo laid down by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Its width is 61.5 meters typifying the June 15 Joint Declaration published in 2000, a great programme for Korean reunification.
					
					The 7,000-ton weight of the tower reflects the strong will of the 70 million Korean people to achieve the reunification of the country with their concerted effort.
					
					Each of the two leaves of the door of the memorial stones exhibition hall weighs three tons, symbolic of solidarity among the Koreans in the north, south and overseas.
					
					Erected nearby the tower was a monument containing a proposition of the President calling for unity of all the Korean people.

articles.title: Large-sized, Long-distance Belt Conveyor
articles.content:
Large-sized, Long-distance Belt Conveyor
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Unryul Mine located in the western area of Korea has benefited from its large-sized and long-distance belt conveyor. 
					The open-pit mine supplying the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex with iron ore was once harassed by myriads of earth-scraping piled up on iron ore seams.
					
					Acquainting himself with the problem, General Secretary Kim Jong Il unfolded a bold and large-scale plan to remove earth-scraping with a belt conveyor.
					
					Under his wise guidance the belt conveyor stretched about 4,600 meters from Lagoon Kumsan to Nunggum Islet in Juche 64 (1975) as the first stage of the project.
					
					 Over the past 35 years it has carried 40 million tons of earth to the sea, linking the mainland with islets.
					
					 It has also saved much manpower, materials and equipment which had been needed for earth removal.
					
					The earth transported by the belt conveyor was used to build a ten-odd-km-long dike from Lagoon Kumsan to Wolsa-ri, Kwail County via Nunggum, Ung and Chongryang Islets and reclaim more than 3,500 hectares of tideland for agricultural production.
					
					 Now the belt conveyor has changed its direction toward Jui Islet from Nunggum Islet.
					
					 The dike has more than 1.3 million trees of several dozen species growing in over 150 hectares. A ring road was also built on it.
					
					 Many animals and birds such as pheasant, roe deer, hare, raccoon dog and cuckoo live there.

articles.title: Dangerous Saber rattling of Warmongers Blasted
articles.content:
Dangerous Saber-rattling of Warmongers Blasted
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises are a test nuclear war aimed at mounting a surprise preemptive strike at the DPRK from the sky, land and seas, to all intents and purposes, as they were kicked off in the wake of the frantic south Korea-U.S. joint naval exercises and the anti-submarine drill of the south Korean puppet army in the East and West Seas of Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					The warmongers inside and outside south Korea are employing a petty trick to cover up the aggressive nature and danger of UFG while painting them as "annual maneuvers" and "exercises to cope with possible provocations" of someone. This is, however, nothing but sheer sophism.
					
					 The on-going exercises lay bare their criminal scenario to ignite another Korean war at any cost by wrecking peace on the Korean Peninsula and escalating the tensions there to an extreme phase.
					
					 It is the invariable aim of the conservative group in south Korea to stifle fellow countrymen and realize its sinister political ambition, backed by foreign forces.
					
					 The large-scale DPRK-targeted war maneuvers staged by the south Korean puppet forces one after another in collusion with the U.S. are very grave military provocations, little short of a declaration of war against the DPRK. It clearly indicates that the group of traitors seeks to realize its scenario to seize the DPRK by force of arms by clinging to the coattails of the U.S. in disregard of the public opinion at home and abroad demanding peaceful solutions to the pending issues of the Korean Peninsula through direct dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 The puppet group had better halt its provocative play with fire, mindful that it can never go scot-free while escalating the tensions and the moves to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK by toeing foreign forces' line.

articles.title: S. Korean Minister of Unification's Reckless Remarks Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Minister of Unification's Reckless Remarks Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Minister of Unification Hyon In Thaek at a recent seminar talked nonsense that "the north is standing at the crossroads of change and option," vociferating about someone's "provocations" and "the act of inviting self-isolation." Making malignant accusations against the DPRK over the warship "Cheonan" case, he presumptuously cried out for "putting the situation under control".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a brigandish logic putting the cart before the horse and a mockery and challenge to the public opinion at home and abroad demanding the improved inter-Korean relations and a switchover in the policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group is wholly to blame for this collapse of the inter-Korean relations as it has desperately followed an anti-reunification policy "towards the north" and frantically pursued the confrontation in collusion with foreign forces since its seizure of power.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean authorities that stand at the crossroads of ceaseless confrontation or detente because they have been thrown into a predicament, repudiated and condemned by the public at home and abroad for being hell-bent on confrontation after faking up the warship case. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, Hyon is so brazen-faced as to dare call for "a change in the north's attitude" and "option," vociferating about  "provocation" and "isolation" and laying the blame for the collapse of the  inter-Korean relations and escalated tension at the door of the DPRK.
					
					 A whole string of jargons let loose by mandarins of the Lee Myung Bak regime indicate that the conservative group remains unchanged in its policy intended to steadily strain the situation over the warship case and provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: Japan's Cowardly Attitude towards US Assailed
articles.content:
Japan's Cowardly Attitude towards US Assailed
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Recently the Japanese government decided to comply with the U.S. request for increasing the spending for the transfer of U.S. Marines present in Okinawa to Guam. Japanese Chief Cabinet Secretary Sengoku clarified the stance to actively cooperate with the U.S., asserting the need for the two governments to energetically push it forward both financially and technologically.
					Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					The U.S. and Japan finally clinched the deal on the transfer of U.S. forces, a controversial issue between the two countries. This brought to daylight the true colors of the Naoto Kan regime as political servants of the U.S. busy pleasing their American master quite contrary to the people's mind-set.
					
					Subservience to the U.S. is the nature peculiar to Japan and a deep-seated bad habit.
					
					The successive Japanese regimes have been censured by the world public for being political waiting maids for the U.S. and political pigmies as they pursued the policy of sycophancy and subservience to the U.S., kowtowing to it. 
					
					Hatoyama advocated "independence" in the policy toward the U.S., chiding the Liberal Democratic Party for enforcing the policy of toeing the U.S. line for decades, and bragged that he would transfer the U.S. military base in Futenma outside Okinawa Prefecture or overseas as strongly demanded by not only the people of the prefecture but also other Japanese. This helped him come to power. But it was before long that he behaved quite contrary to their expectations.
					
					Finally, he met a miserable fate of being hit by the bullets shot by the Japanese people and the U.S. as he turned his coat readily to prolong the days of his political career bereft of his political principle. 
					
					Naoto Kan is also becoming mean in his attitude towards his American master to please him, oblivious of the bitter lesson taught by his predecessor who was ousted from power for being subservient to the U.S. This indicates that the Naoto Kan regime is also following the policy of subservience to the U.S. 
					
					It is the historical truth that the Japanese government is bound to short-live as it is enforcing politics to please his American master, bereft of any political principle and independence, forsaken by the people.

articles.title: Papers Warn Provocateurs of Punishment
articles.content:
Papers Warn Provocateurs of Punishment
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces finally ignite another Korean war defying the strong opposition of the people of the DPRK and the rest of the world, they will suffer the bitterest defeat in their history of wars.
					 Papers Tuesday warn this in signed commentaries.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists across south Korea once again are of very dangerous and provocative nature, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S.-touted "counteraction" precisely means the use of armed forces against the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are crying out for "boosting the capability of the alliance" with south Korea in a bid to put it under their tighter control and use the puppet army as cannon fodder for another Korean war any moment. The on-going war maneuvers are designed to achieve this objective. 
					
					 Provocateurs of a war always require a pretext for doing so. The U.S. imperialists are escalating military pressure and blackmail against the DPRK under the pretext of the warship case. They are keen to ignite an all-out war against the DPRK all of a sudden while staging the large-scale war maneuvers with armed forces for aggression involved. 
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the U.S. imperialists are staging UFG under the simulated conditions of a nuclear war. 
					
					 Their much-touted "counteraction" means a declaration of war whereas UFG is a joint military operation to put it into practice.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will not remain an onlooker to the U.S. imperialists staging three-dimensional attack operations in the seas, etc. with huge armed forces involved and thereby gravely threatening its sovereignty. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that if the Lee Myung Bak group ignites a war of aggression against the DPRK in league with the U.S., the army and people of the DPRK will wipe out all the aggressors and achieve the cause of national reunification by displaying the militant will they have reinforced so far.

articles.title: Actions against Imperialists' Moves for Aggression Called for
articles.content:
Actions against Imperialists' Moves for Aggression Called for
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- It is important for realizing human desire for peace and prosperity and development of nations to foil the maneuvers of the imperialists for aggression and war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The peoples can never protect the sovereignty of their countries, much less achieving prosperity and development in the new century,  as long as the imperialists are allowed to persist in military intervention and aggression. This is the lesson drawn from the present complicated international situation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The imperialists are ferocious and cruel and there is no limit to their avarices. They never make a present of peace to the people. They get fiercer and more desperate as they find in a more unfavorable situation.
					
					 They opt for alliance in pursuit of their aggressive purposes. This situation compels the people to counter the imperialists' moves for military intervention and aggression with the strategy of unity. 
					
					 The countries advocating independence and peace should not be taken in by the imperialists' moves for split and alienation but settle the differences among them through dialogues and negotiations on the principle of respect for their sovereignty. 
					
					 The Korean people will frustrate the moves of the imperialists for aggression and wage a dynamic struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and preserve peace on the Korean Peninsula and thus make a positive contribution to building a new peaceful world free from aggression and war. 
					
					 The imperialists' moves for aggression and war are bound to go bust if the world progressives put up a dynamic struggle, united close under the banner of peace against war, concludes the article.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Maneuvers of US under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Maneuvers of US under Fire in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions issued a statement on August 14 demanding the U.S. imperialists and puppet warmongers immediately stop their reckless war exercises targeted against the DPRK.
					 The statement accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and escalating tension and confrontation on the Korean Peninsula as soon as he came to power.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the authorities intensified the confrontation between the south and the north after the outbreak of the warship "Cheonan" case, creating such tense situation on the peninsula that a war may break out there any moment, it noted.
					
					 The statement condemned the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak "government" for having staged large-scale war exercises in the East and West seas of Korea, crying out for what they called "retaliation".
					
					 Querying them for whom the confrontation and war are necessary, the statement urged the bellicose forces to halt at once the above-said dangerous war maneuvers.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Exercises Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Exercises Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers started the provocative joint military exercises Ulji Freedom Guardian, the largest-ever DPRK-targeted nuclear war rehearsal, on Monday despite the strong protests of all Koreans and the world peace-loving people, according south Korea's KBS.
					Involved in the exercises led by the south Korea-U.S. Combined Forces Command are more than 30 000 U.S. troops stationed in south Korea and abroad and 56,000 south Korean puppet troops including commands of above level of corps, fleet and air division along with a lot of up-to-date war equipment.
					
					 The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea announced that the ongoing joint military rehearsal is one of the largest-scale joint staff directed theatre exercises in the world.
					
					 The warmongers are getting hell-bent in the reckless DPRK-targeted nuclear war exercises, allegedly to "cope with threat to security" and "defend" themselves.
					
					Meanwhile, the Ulji exercises, a rehearsal under battle conditions for wartime preparations, were launched on the same day with 400,000 persons, including officials of the puppet administration organs and members of non-governmental businesses, involved.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak, crazy about the anti-DPRK war rackets, called "Ulji security meeting" and "Ulji state council meeting" at the basement of "Chongwadae" to urge thoroughgoing preparedness. And he stressed the need to inspect the war-time preparedness of the military and the "government", inciting war fever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Venezuela 
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in pamphlet by the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela on Aug. 6.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode of our era which carried forward and developed the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung on attaching importance to arms and a scientific revolutionary line and a political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also refers to the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: New Group for Study of Juche Idea Inaugurated in Germany
articles.content:
New Group for Study of Juche Idea Inaugurated in Germany
 Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany was inaugurated with due ceremony on July 22.
					 An academic figure of Germany was elected chief of the group at the ceremony.
					
					He said that he would widely organize seminars on works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and their exploits on the occasions of major holidays of the DPRK, intensify the study of the Juche idea and steadily improve the modality of its activities in the course of its operation.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked
Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- A round-table talk took place in Venezuela, a seminar and a film show in Germany, an opening ceremony of the week of photo exhibition in Nigeria and an art performance and a book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Russia between Aug. 4 and 12 to celebrate the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed in the venues were books and photos introducing the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and handiworks associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The organizational secretary of the Communist Party of Venezuela said that the party established and has long developed the friendly relations based on the revolutionary principles with the Workers' Party of Korea. And he expressed belief that the Korean people would surely win in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country from the imperialists' aggression moves. 
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany spoke highly of the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il, saying that the self-reliant defence capabilities of the DPRK have been unprecedentedly increased since he gave his field guidance to a tank division of the Korean People's Army 50 years ago and eye-opening successes have been made on all fronts of economic construction.
					
					 The director of the Council of Art and Culture under the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria noted with high appreciation that President Kim Il Sung liberated Korea from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, built a socialist system in the DPRK where the people are masters and devoted his all to national reunification.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the function in Germany.
					
					 Meanwhile, a national seminar on the Songun politics took place in Valencia, Venezuela on Aug. 6 and Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, issued a statement on Aug. 9 to mark the 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Ro Tu Chol conversa con su par laosiano
articles.content:
Ro Tu Chol conversa con su par laosiano
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 17 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre el vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ro Tu Chol, y el vicepremier permanente del gobierno de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, Somsavath Lengsavath.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion por la parte coreana el vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior, Ri Myong San, y otros funcionarios, y por la laosiana, la comitiva de Somsavath y el embajador Chaleune Warinthrasak, acreditado en Corea.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y otros problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Acto de pyongyaneses por 20o aniversario de obra de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Acto de pyongyaneses por 20o aniversario de obra de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en la Casa Central de Obreros el acto de los capitalinos por el 20o aniversario de la obra del Presidente Kim Il Sung "Aproximemos la reunificacion de la patria con las fuerzas mancomunadas de toda la nacion", publicada el 18 de agosto del 79 (1990) de la Era Juche.
					La obra indica generalmente las tareas y remedios presentados en el movimiento por la reunificacion, tales como el problema de reunificar la patria a modo de sistema federal y a base de los tres principios, o sea, la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional y el de formar un amplio frente de toda la nacion coreana y luchar con las fuerzas unidas por la reunificacion.
					
					El vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, senalo en el informe que en acato a la obra del Presidente que indico el camino correcto para resolver con las fuerzas propias de la nacion coreana el problema de reunificacion, se ha librado energicamente en el interior y exterior del pais la lucha por organizar el movimiento por la reunificacion como el pannacional basandose en los exitos del congreso pannacional y como resultado, quedo constituida por fin la alianza pannacional por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					La idea del Presidente acerca de la gran unidad nacional y sus valiosas experiencias adquiridas en esta materia constituyen un patrimonio de nuestra patria y la firme base de la gran unidad pannacional y la reunificacion independiente del pais, senalo el y ratifico que las proezas del Presidente se registraran eternamente en los anales de la patria.
					
					La causa de reunificacion de la patria del Presidente se va cumpliendo con exito por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, afirmo.
					
					Al publicar las obras como "Materialicemos de modo consecuente el legado del gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung para la reunificacion de la patria" y "Que toda la nacion unida alcance la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria", el Dirigente ilumino la senda para mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y abrir una coyuntura trascendental para la reunificacion de la patria, subrayo.
					
					El Dirigente propicio la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de ejecucion de la primera, gracias a lo cual llego la nueva era para lograr la unidad de la nacion y la reunificacion independiente del pais bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", destaco.
					
					Por ultimo, exhorto a todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar a unirse compactamente bajo la bandera de la reunificacion de la patria y del amor por la patria y la nacion y a levantarse unanimemente en la lucha por adelantar la reunificacion de la patria frustrando tajantemente las imprudentes maniobras de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion.

articles.title: Cuadros del Estado visitan varios lugares de Hamhung
articles.content:
Cuadros del Estado visitan varios lugares de Hamhung
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los cuadros del Estado y los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 17 varios lugares de la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					Sobre todo, los visitantes rindieron tributo al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras depositar ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en la ciudad.
					
					Llegados a la Fabrica de Hierro Fundido Songun y el taller de compresor Songun, inaugurados nuevamente en el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong, recorrieron los procesos de produccion escuchando las explicaciones sobre las imborrables hazanas de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Viendo las piezas fundidas de buena calidad y modernos compresores que se producen, ellos aprendieron el indoblegable espiritu de lucha de los obreros de Ryongsong.
					
					Acto seguido, estuvieron en los Complejos de Abonos de Hungnam y de Vinalon 8 de Febrero.
					
					El clima agitado en el campo de construccion de las instalaciones de gasificacion de Hungnam y el impetu revolucionario de la clase obrera reinante en la gran base quimica (Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero), donde se produce en avalanchas esta fibra, conmovieron mucho a los visitantes.
					
					En su recorrido por la exposicion de articulos de consumo popular de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, ellos quedaron admirados del estilo de lucha de los trabajadores de la provincia que fabrican utiles articulos de consumo buscando y empleando los materiales locales, los derivados agricolas y los materiales ociosos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena disparate de Hyon In Thaek
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena disparate de Hyon In Thaek
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el ministro titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea, Hyon In Thaek, dijo en un seminario que "el Norte esta en el dilema de cambio y opcion" cuestionando la "provocacion" de alguien y el "aislamiento buscado por si mismo". Ademas, acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en cuanto al incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", diciendo atrevidamente que ellos (titeres surcoreanos) "tienen que corregir" tal situacion. 
					En un comentario individual de este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun califica ese disparate de sofisteria de bandido y de burla y desafio a la opinion publica interna y externa que demanda la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y el cambio de la politica de confrontacion con la RPDC.
					
					Las relaciones Norte-Sur cayeron ahora en la coyuntura catastrofica debido a la banda de conservadores surcoreanos que desde el primer dia de su mandato, vino insistiendo en la "politica sobre el Norte" de caracter anti-reunificacion y practicando la campana conflictiva en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, revela el comentarista y continua:
					
					Los que se hallan en la disyuntiva de enfrentamiento continuo o alivio de la tension son las autoridades surcoreanas repudiadas dentro y fuera del pais por haber recurrido a las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida tras la invencion del caso del "Cheonan". 
					
					Sin embargo, Hyon In Thaek imputa a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la ruptura de las relaciones Norte-Sur y de la agravacion de la tension hablando de la "provocacion" y "aislamiento". Para colmo, el esta exigiendo atrevidamente el supuesto "cambio de actitud" y "opcion". 
					
					Tales chismes tan cinicos pronunciados uno tras otro por los llamados ministros del "gobierno" de Lee Myung Bak insinuan que es invariable la politica de esta banda de conservadores de agravar de continuo la situacion bajo el pretexto del caso del "Cheonan" y provocar a la larga la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica la sumision a EE.UU. de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica la sumision a EE.UU. de Japon
Pyongyang, 17 de agosto (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el gobierno japones decidio aceptar la demanda de Estados Unidos de aumentar los gastos para el traslado del cuerpo de marines norteamericanos desde Okinawa a la isla Guam.
					El director del secretariado del gabinete japones, Sengoku, expreso la posicion de cooperar activamente con EE.UU. en ese tema diciendo que los gobiernos de ambos paises deben promoverlo dinamicamente tanto en la inversion de fondos como en el plano tecnico. 
					
					De esta manera, quedo solucionado el problema de gastos para el traslado de las tropas norteamericanas a la isla Guam que era una polemica entre esos dos paises. Al mismo tiempo, se ha revelado claramente a todo el mundo que el nuevo poder de Naoto Kan tambien es otro lacayo politico que anda adulando a su amo norteamericano y da espaldas a la opinion publica.
					
					Senala asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado este martes y prosigue:
					
					El servilismo a EE.UU. es el temperamento y vicio cronico de Japon. 
					
					Historicamente, Japon fue burlado por todo el mundo como doncella politica de EE.UU. y enano politico por su actitud tan sumisa a este imperio.
					
					Hatoyama llego al poder criticando la politica servil a EE.UU. practicada varios decenios por el Partido Democratico Liberal y prometiendo con fanfarroneria que estableceria la "independencia" en la politica sobre EE.UU. y expulsaria la base militar norteamericana de Futenma a las afueras de Okinawa o del pais de acuerdo con la fuerte demanda de los habitantes japoneses, incluso los de ese departamento.
					
					Pero, poco despues, defraudo la esperanza del pueblo con el engano y la traicion.
					
					En fin, por sus acciones oportunistas y faltas de entereza politica, Hatoyama ha sido doblemente castigado.
					
					Sin embargo, Naoto Kan se porta como su antecesor adulando al amo gringo.
					
					Esto insinua que el poder de Naoto Kan practicara tambien la politica de sumision a EE.UU. 
					
					La historia muestra la verdad de que fueron cortos los mandatos de los sucesivos regimenes japoneses que no mantuvieron la independencia ni el criterio politico y dieron espaldas a la voluntad del pueblo para congraciarse con su amo.
